name: Vinland
startIntroPart1: Howdy to you Captain Alwida! You were the Captain of the first generation of the Vinland Pirates, escaping the cold seas of Scandinava to the sunny beaches and riches of the Carribbean. No weapons is strong enough against your tentacles as your strength destroy them all.
startIntroPart2: Mighty Queen of the Seas, your crew calls you again to lead them! While you will inspire loyalty to your crew, you will inspire fear to your ennemies. Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: Do you really thought we would stay peaceful ? We're pirates for God's sake!
attacked: Prepare to learn Davy Jones' locker combinaison!
defeated: My life on the endless seas came to an end it seems. May the frontier we opened stay forever like that.
introduction: Yarrr! I'm Alwida, first captain of the Vinlanders. Forget about the tentacles. Care for a drink ?
hateHello: I'm not in the mood right now.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Hey, let's have another drink! Once you're totally drunk, you'll forget about it!
tradeRequest: I know trading with pirates seems ridiculous but here's a good deal !
